bullets: Led the end-to-end development of VisionFrame AI, an innovative AI-powered digital art platform.
Managed client communications, addressing concerns and integrating feedback to meet expectations.
Assigned tasks and supervised junior developers to maintain project timelines and ensure on-time delivery.
Trained and mentored junior team members, fostering growth in their technical skills and project contributions.
Built VisionFrame AI from scratch, including mobile app and backend systems, for an intuitive and engaging user experience.
Delivered client-requested features and solutions, ensuring the platform aligned with their vision and requirements.
Played a key role in developing critical features, including enabling app-to-machine communication and real-time tracking of machine statuses.
Led the implementation of the core “Measurement” functionality for enhanced usability in healthcare settings.
Actively contributed to identifying and resolving bugs, ensuring smooth functionality and maintaining high application quality.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews, supporting team growth and maintaining coding standards.
Developed Android applications from scratch, including SIMONE (insurance app) and RedDot (emergency SOS app), using Kotlin.
Released multiple applications to Google Play Store, ensuring a smooth and user-ready launch.
Maintained and enhanced existing applications, including the Handsup time-tracking app, developed in Java.
Actively monitored reports, addressed inquiries, and resolved bugs to maintain high-quality performance and user satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate essential features like policy management, time tracking, and emergency notifications.
Contributed to and maintained existing projects, ensuring stability and implementing necessary improvements.
Actively monitored reports, addressed inquiries, and resolved bugs to maintain optimal app performance and user satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate essential features, enhancing app functionality and usability.
Released applications on Google Play Store, managing end-to-end deployment for Centrix and 1go Loadr apps.
Experienced in independently managing projects, overseeing both mobile app and backend components.
Communicated directly with project heads, leading discussions and making key decisions on project direction.
